review_text: Ordered online and got collection a few mins later. Service was great. We got the beef bowl and the chicken bowl with some extra falafel. Both bowls looked great when I got them back and tasted fantastic. Fresh veg and flavoursome rice. The beef was juicy and the falafel was crispy on the outside and soft inside. Highly recommend.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Richard! We are so glad you had a great experience

review_text: Love the fresh made pita here. Line & wait can be long during rush hours but you can order online. Chicken wrap is excellent, great portion and the fries make it so decadent. Fried eggplant   is awesome if you want to go all out. Nice neighborhood & picnic in the park go-to.

I recently visited Superbaba for the first time and was impressed enough to want to return. Although Im not typically inclined to spend a lot on food, I hesitated when I saw the $15 price tag for the dish I wanted. However, after observing others orders, I decided to give it a try, and Im glad I did. I chose the chicken bowl, and the Middle Eastern flavors were fantastic, while the portion size was adequate. The only downside was that the restaurant was a bit chilly, but since its located near the entrance and its freezing outside, this is likely the case for most places along Main Street. I had a great experience here and enjoyed the shawarma. The meat was very flavorful and everything appeared to be fresh. The portion size was decent, although the bowl had more veggies than meat. Additionally, the cost was a bit high, but overall it was a positive experience. Its worth noting that all the meat served is Halal.
response_from_owner_text: That s great Karan, we are so glad you liked it. The temperature of the room is my fault, I m still testing out our new A/C system and may have left it on the lowest setting by mistake.

review_text: This is probably one of my top 5 favorite places to eat. Love everything about this place! Nice chill vibe, staff are always friendly and the food is fantastic. Have been here multiple times and will continue to come back. Wish there was one closer to where I live. Highly recommend eating here!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Hopefully our next location will be closer to you!

review_text: Dined in. Great place for a quick dinner. Bright and clean dining room, fast and friendly service, and delicious, fresh, healthy-tasting food. Our party had chicken wrap, chicken bowl, and beef bowl. Asked for an received extra lettuce instead of rice in the bowls. Had some fried eggplant and French fries on the side. Everybody was very happy and the food disappeared very quickly, leaving only satisfied customers. Sort of like the best, healthiest, street trick food you could imagine. Not cheap, but way cheaper than   and just as as good as   a regular restaurant serving the same kinds of dishes. Will definite do again.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Stephen, we hope to see you again!

review_text: SUPERBABA (Vancouver) 9/10 - Overall Dayum! This middle-eastern quick-service restaurant is VERY GOOD!  Im a big meat eater, but decided to go vegetarian and and I was very surprised how good this was.  And the bonus - its healthier than a lot of other things Ive been consuming! CRISPY EGGPLANT BOWL $15.50 Battered & fried eggplant, seasoned egg, tomato & cucumber salad, pickles, hummus, tahini, shug, and amba.  So many different flavours, I would get this bowl again and again! So good! 9/10 Would I come back? Definitely! Although the other options look good as well, Id be totally fine with getting the same thing, it was that good!

It really is as good as people say. Came on my lunch break the other day and asked the cashier for her recommendation - got the Chicken Bowl, Mint Lemonade and Turmeric Cookie. So so so good. Service was fast and friendly, the restaurant was clean and the portion was decent. Will definitely be coming back!

I loved the food truck for many years. This is the first time I ve been to the physical location. Very tasty Mediterranean half rice half salad bowls. I chose the chicken thighs. Delicious! Worth repeating. Love the flavours, the juicy tender chicken, quality and fresh ingredients.    forgot to take pictures. If you haven t tried then you should give it a try.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for supporting us since the early days!

review_text: I had the chicken shwarma wrap and it was delicious! Very flavorful, although a tad on the dry side. Huge amount of meat too- good value. Very friendly service! Can t wait to return.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Paul! I ll let the team know to keep an eye on sauce levels to make sure there s enough

review_text: Love this place for so many reasons. Crispy eggplant the best. Chicken bowl extremely good as well. Pickles deadly. One of the best parts when you order for 5 pm they have it ready at 5pm, not 430pm sitting there getting cold. Best food in the city for this type.
Delicious  fast food  style middle eastern joint! Only tried the bowls today, but definitely coming back to try the wraps!

We love the food at Superbaba. Its fresh, tasty, and reasonably priced. Service however is a bit hit or miss. Some staff are very friendly but some make me feel like I am inconveniencing them when ordering. Also not a fan that the card machine prompts for a tip at a restaurant that offers no service.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review and feedback. That is definitely something for us to look into, we want to make sure everyone feels welcome always.

review_text: One of the most tastiest Mediterranean food in Vancouver. Amazing chicken shawarma! Advising everyone to order online, pick it up at the store and eat it at the nearby park.

This is my first time going to Superbaba  and it won t be my last. I m not one to spend a lot of money on food, so when I saw the $15 price tag for the meal I wanted, I wasn t so sure I wanted to order. But then I saw other people s orders and thought maybe it would be worth it. And it was. I ordered the chicken bowl. The middle eastern flavours were great and the portion size was respectable. The place was a bit cold for my liking, but you re also near the entrance and it s freezing outside, so probably the same for most places along Main Street.
Great food and staff are happy, inviting, and aware of cleanliness during food prep
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Neil! That s really great, we love to see that the staff s hard work is recognized :)

review_text: Ratings Scale 0 - 10 Variety: 8 Service or Product: 9 Customer Service: 9 Environment: 8 Cleaning: 8 Washroom: 8 Cost: 7 I really enjoyed the Shawarma and my wife enjoyed the bowl here. The meat was very tasty and everything seemed fresh! The portion size was quite good, except that the meat was a little less in the bowl and it was more veggies. Also it was a little pricy but still a great experience P.S: All meat is Halal.

Super fresh, moist meat, not too powerful on the onion or garlic flavors- nice balance, clean food, lots of options and great sauces, and clean location with good amount of seating and space. Great for vegans and meat lovers.

Amazing food, extremely tasty and delicious. We got the chicken wrap, eggplant wrap, and the fresh cut fries with sumac mayo. The chicken was cooked to perfection, very juicy and lots of flavor. The eggplant was absolutely delicious. The fries were amazing and the sumac mayo a perfect combination. Now i know why this amazing middle eastern resaturant was nominated best casual restaurant. Ive read so many amazing reviews about this middle eastern restaurant.  I see what the hype is all about. Definitely recommend this restaurant.

Superbaba is a gem in the Mount Pleasant community. Its middle eastern chipotle, but way better. The grilled chicken thighs are grilled-to-order and with the garlic sauce it is so flavourful and absolutely delicious, highly recommend the chicken bowl. The vegetables garnishes were extremely fresh, colorful, with a tasty dressing. The side of crispy eggplant with their excellent hummus was also good and not too heavy. Definitely recommend if you are looking for an affordable and healthy dine-out option.
response_from_owner_text: We are so flattered! Thank you Wesley!

review_text: The food is delicious! We got the chicken and falafel bowls. Everything in the bowl was seriously good. Chicken was nicely cooked and falafel balls were flavourful and crunchy. The sauces and green sides were on point. I think it was love at first taste.

Superbaba is easily one of the BEST restaurants in Vancouver. Truly a hidden gem. Beyond delicious, fresh and the pricing/portions are very reasonable! I always leave full and feeling great. I could eat their food everyday - that s how amazing this place is. Atmosphere and aesthetics are fun which is a bonus. Highly recommend the chicken bowl and side of falafel :). You guys are awesome, please don t change!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Thanh, you are a wonderful person, thank you for the review!

review_text: Some of the top Mediterranean food I ve ever had! Staff was also UNREAL on Thursday night! The chicken, so tender!! Gotta get the crispy eggplant too! That s the chefs kiss baby!
Of course I had to get the Falafel bowl with extra crispy eggplant      Super good, generous portions. Fries was nice & crispy too!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kim! We are so glad you enjoyed it!

review_text: Finally Superbaba has graduated from a food truck to a brick and mortar location in Vancouver. This is no doubt THE best middle eastern food Ive had period. You cannot go wrong with the menu. Everything here tastes absolutely amazing. I love the sandwiches, especially the chicken one. The meat is tender & tasty. Also the addition of fries to the sandwich is a nice touch. The bread is freshly baked in house. Dont forget to ask for the hot sauce. Also their Falafels are the best ones Ive had in Vancouver. Another thing I love on their menu is the Sabich (Tempura eggplant). Crispy on the outside and soft inside. Superbaba is one of the very few places where ill pay to eat vegetarian food and enjoy it. Also did I mention their turmeric cookie is really good? The owners are super friendly and passionate about what they do.

Superbaba is super good! A real modern take on a middle eastern classic. The pickled onions, the delightful sauce that leaves a tinge of lime at the end, and steak that melts as you bite into it. Kind staff as well, but I wish I could have sat in to enjoy my wrap. Regardless, a must try on Main!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sartaj! We are working on getting seating in soon :)

review_text: I visited the restaurant yesterday and had an amazing experience. The chicken bowl I ordered was simply incredible and unlike anything Ive ever tried before. It was so delicious that I cant even describe it accurately. The chicken was perfectly cooked, juicy, and had an outstanding flavor. The overall combination of ingredients was just perfect. Kudos to the chefs for doing such a fantastic job. Well done!
I was so positively surprised! SUPER YUMMY FOOD, Great environment, great service. All very very good. Just wish they had more vegan options
response_from_owner_text: Thank you! If you like you can order the eggplant option and let them know it s vegan to switch the egg to a falafel ball. And the cauliflower option can also be made vegan too they switch the mayo to tahini.

review_text: This place is so so good. The chicken wrap with some extra falafel and spicy sauce is my go to. Unlike other businesses around, they havent reduced the portion sizes as they ve grown in popularity which I really appreciate. Friendly staff and nice area to sit and enjoy lunch.

It s so good, I almost ate the wrapper. Chicken is fresh and juicy (my favourite item on the menu: chicken wrap). Vegetarian options: It s Lebanese cuisine, ie. Yummy vegan options : Falafels, crispy eggplants, crispy cauliflowers. Everything is so gooood. Kid-friendliness: My kids LOVE IT

Absolutely delicious. In a week it turned into my go to for my lunches during work days. So far I have had the falafel, crispy eggplant and chicken, either on wrap or bowl format, and they were all delicious and tasty. Have heard wonders about their cookies and their fries. Next on my list. A must go. Totally recommended!
So fresh so good!  Love this fresh new take on Lebanese food.  Everything is cooked to perfection.  Im a meat eater but man this crispy eggplant is just dynamite.

Wow! It s one of my new favourite places! The service is great, everyone is very polite and helpful. I ordered the falafel bowl (I suggest going full salad instead of half rice) and added the crispy eggplant as well. Absolutely delicious! They have a great online ordering portal which made pick up seamless. Highly recommend!

Delicious wraps - loved the falafel, the tastiest Ive had in Canada to date. Nice vibe if you eat in, quick service and although on the more expensive side for a falafel wrap, you get a good portion and the quality is worth it. Vegetarian options: Great for vegetarians - thoroughly recommend.
We love your food we think it s delicious we have enjoyed eating here and we will still eat here!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! Please visit us again soon!

review_text: An excellent place to have lunch particularly to enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and self-serve restaurant. Beer and other alcoholic drinks available. Courteous staff with normal ambience

Superbaba is a welcome addition to Vancouver. Steak, sabich (eggplant) and chicken were amazing! Be sure to try their falafel and also fries with sumac mayo. Staff were friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing the cauliflower from the Victoria location added to the Vancouver menu!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Solomon, we are so happy that you enjoyed your experience. Don t worry, it s on the way, we just didn t have the right packaging for it! See you again soon :)

review_text: Super cute place with good food at reasonable prices and friendly staff. Service was quick even tho it was busy. Would definitely return and recommend. Good variety of healthy food and some good vegan/vegi options Vegetarian options: Multiple options

WOW! Hands down THE BEST Lebanese restaurant in town.  Ive tried almost everything on the menu and every single item is yummy. We order  through their online scheduled pick-up system, almost once a week. The service is amazing, the place is super clean and the food is out of this world.  I can never chose what I want, so we usually end up ordering everything! :p  Chicken bowl, steak bowl with added eggs and crispy egg plant, side of falafel, side of Baba Ganoush, side of yogurt, turmeric cookie...HEAVEN! Thank you and keep up the good work!

My husband and I stumbled across this place while visiting Vancouver and this is the best middle eastern food we ve ever had. Incredibly tasty and good quality ingredients at a reasonable price. If they ever expand to Toronto we will be their #1 customers.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Anastasia, we are so happy you enjoyed it. Maybe one day we will get to open in Toronto :)

review_text: So good! I had their falafel bowl which comes with three falafel, deep fried cauliflower, on greens and some cabbage.. I usually dont love falafel but reviews raved about so I got it.  They are crispy and not dry.  The side sauces especially the green Shug is SO good. One thing I would change is putting the Cucumber and arugula salad into another container as it gets soggy within minutes of being in the same container as the hit food. Also it lacks a little bit of flavor.  Still really good and I crave the falafel bowl Definitely try this place
Tasted great, reasonably priced, and friendly staff. The falafel bowl is vegan and the server said the sabich bowl can also be made vegan.
These were so good!! Also ordered the pickles and they were awesome! Love that they have vegan / plant based options!!

We ordered the falafel bowl, falafel wrap, falafel sides and fries! The quantity was great and the food was yummy!! This place is one of our favourites when we don t want to think about where to order from!
response_from_owner_text: That s so great to read, thank you!

review_text: Modern falafel and meat wraps with tip notch toppings. We ordered the spicy wraps with aside of fries. Every bite was delicious and I was stuffed half way through the meal.

It s better than the real deal in the Middle East. Fresh grilled chicken, fresh pickled cabbage, fresh veggies! So good so yummy. So well done and clean. Worth it :) Kid-friendliness: Good for families too
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sura, that is very kind of you to say, we are so happy you had a great experience

review_text: Loved their food and was so happy they brought a food truck to Vancouver. Ive been to their restaurant in Victoria and its fantastic! The food truck definitely does not disappoint. Do yourself a favour and try their falafel. Best falafel Ive ever had
Beat food truck to restaurant in Vancouver. Falafels are amazing. Turmeric cookie is perfect. Vegetarian options: Tons of vegetarian food.

After great experiences at Superbaba in Victoria, I was SO excited to learn that the Vancouver location was opening up earlier this year. So far, Superbaba in Vancouver has been amazing too. The food is absolutely incredible and very fairly priced, the people are kind and clearly hardworking, and the decor is fairly understated but beautiful (especially the woodwork). Since the opening of this location about a month ago, my partner and I have made a point of getting dinner there once a week, and it is delicious every time. Fresh and flavourful. The wraps, falafel, fried cauliflower, mint lemonade, cookies (both types are fantastic) -- you cant go wrong.

Always thought food trucks were some fad I didnt care about but one day I was super hungry and stopped by this one... now Im addicted to the falafel bowl. its absolutely incredible every time. Wait is decently long at lunch but you can order online. Staff is nice (though clearly very busy !)
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Daphne! So nice of you to say. And thank you for your patience during the lunch rush :)

review_text: This team is A1! They care about the food they make, the people they serve and their fellow team members. Had to add one of the best falafel balls ever to my spicy chicken bowl too! Will definitely be back

Delicious falafel and sabich in wrap form or bowl form. Very nice to have such a delicious addition to the community. Fries also have a delicious garlic mayo. Only take out when I went but maybe sometime in the future we ll get to enjoy their beautiful interior.
Super indeed. Big portion, scarfed half before picture, great seasoning nice tzatziki. Wrap Kafka was delicious too.
Oh wow. This was hands down the best lunch I ve had in months. Everything down to the pita was perfection and so, so fresh. Service was fast and easy. 6/5 stars.

Updated Post Incredible difference within a few weeks of the original post. It took me 6 minutes to get my order today during the lunch rush. Staff were polite and quick. The chicken wrap tasted great. Did you know they put fries in their wraps? Genius! Original Post Waiting 45 minutes for takeout in a fast food style restaurant is not okay. About 5 other guests went to ask if their other was still coming. Said it s coming right up but it still took another 10 minutes from then. Did not offer anything to compensate and didn t even apologize when the order was ready.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jamie! I m glad we were able to make up for your first visit. Thanks for being understanding! Please visit us again soon! Update: we appreciate that, and we will be better soon. Looking forward to your next visit Thanks, Jamie, we are understaffed right now because of covid and getting busier every day. We are working on it. While your rating doesnt help our situation, if I would have seen what happened, I would have given you the food for free, trust me. I hope you can have some empathy during our opening weeks. Thank you

review_text: This place is AMAZING! I order from them regularly, the food quality is exceptional. Last time I ordered my Falafel Bowl was a bit disappointing... was missing cauliflower and the salad quality seemed lower (a lot of iceberg lettuce), but all the other times were excellent so this was likely just a one off. You can order off their website for take out, so that its ready when you arrive.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ben!! Just to let you know, the cauliflower no longer comes in the Falafel bowl or wrap - we had to make a decision to raise the price of those items or take out the Cauliflower and give it its own menu item. I will take a look at the greens, but recently we switched to fresh romaine lettuce as our mixed greens were coming in bitter and wilted. If you have any other feedback please email me at info@eatsuperbaba.com

review_text: I have been coming here with my girlfriend for years now. We originally discovered Superbaba when on vacation in Victoria and fell in love with it. We were so happy when we discovered that they had a Vancouver location. Everything is 5/5 stars: the food, service, pricing, and team. Leia is especially very nice, friendly and professional. The best place for falafel and middle Eastern food in Vancouver!!

Really good food. There are still some kinks to work out with the online ordering, but progress is being made. Also, while very subjective, the music they play is the best Ive heard in any restaurant.

The people here are absolutely lovely. The place is so clean. The food is incredible. Too bad you can t eat in, but soon. Had chicken pita with fries. Amazing. Family had 3 diff bowls. All amazing. Fries are not to be missed. So good. 6   s if I could
This is hands down one of the best middle eastern food I have had around Vancouver. The flavours, the quantity, the price, everything is just perfect. Highly recommend!
This place is great, their bowls and wraps are delicious and they have good different options, the staff is always super friendly too.
My favourite spot for Middle Eastern bowls in the city so far.. shawarma chicken with falafel and/or sabich (eggplant) added is a must, give it a try! Only wish this spot had better parking.
response_from_owner_text: We feel you on the parking situation around here :( but thank you so much for supporting us! You are too kind

review_text: Blown away! Every time we walk by Superbaba it is busy, so we decided to give it a try. It is the best Middle Eastern Ive had in Vancouver, hands down. Everything tastes incredible!

Not sure if its pronounced Super-baba or Superb-abba, but theres one thing I know for sure....this is the greatest restaurant of all time. Great bowls. Great wraps. Amazing staff and service. Why are you still reading my review?? Get on down to SUPERBABA!
This place is unreal. I never order vegetarian dishes but the cauliflower bowl is incredible so I have to order it every time. Chicken wrap is unreal too. Don t get the beef wrap it s not as good.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Graham! We are still working on some updates on the beef option, we hope it continues to improve.

review_text: love the crispy eggplant bowl. great service too, even provided a complimentary cookie because our order was late
response_from_owner_text: Very happy to hear we could make it up to you for the wait, thanks for visiting us!

review_text: i love the falafel bowl don t even get me STARTED!! it s the best falafel i ve had and the portion size is quite generous. also, the staff is helpful, friendly, and kind :)

I LOVE THIS PLACE!! Their food is always delicious and packed full of flavor, I always get their chicken/falafel bowl. They just released a fried cauliflower bowl and it tastes heavenly too. I wish I lived closer or they are on delivery apps because I will have it every other day. Kudos to the team!! Vegetarian options: Falafel, fried cauliflower
Good food and atmosphere. This usually doesnt happen but I liked chicken and eggplant more than kofte beef.
response_from_owner_text: We are so glad you enjoyed it!

review_text: Amazing chicken platter. Not too spicy but very flavourful. 10/10 would go again!
So tasty and worth every penny! Very fair prices and always service with a smile. Perfect for a quick lunch or dinner that doesn t feel too greasy or heavy. One of our new favourite spots!
SO DELICIOUS!!!! Hands down my favourite place to get takeout on my way home from work. Great addition to the neighbourhood!! I tell my friends and coworkers to get their food all the time.

Wow the reviews really aren t wrong this place is so so good. Seems just like a basic takeout place but has really great food. I got the falafel wrap with an extra fried eggplant which was so good. I loved all the sauces and it was a nice large wrap. My boyfriend got the steak bowl which he said he really liked but wish it had a bit more rice or meat. Also got the mint lemonade which tasted super fresh and very tart but still sweet and nice. Overall great experience and really nice staff. Definitely try it!
Delicious taste, wonderful staff, positive vibe; everything is excellent here.

Giant portion, very filling and very fresh. Didnt realize they bake the pita in the store so it is super fresh and fantastic. Lemonade is very tart and refreshing even though the hibiscus lemonade was a sweet colour didnt have a lot of hibiscus flavour.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We will check on that lemonade and see if we can punch it up a bit with the hibiscus.

review_text: Falafel Bowl was delicious. It was a perfect combination of colours, textures, and flavours.
Great food! Awesome pick up and online ordering. Get the pita it is made of dreams!!

The chicken, falafel and pita are nice, but I wish the salads and rice were not chilled, I really dont like that there are cold parts in the wrap/bowl. Also the wait is pretty long. ----------- Much better now with the warm rice, thanks!
response_from_owner_text: Hey Alex, just to let you know, we now serve our rice warm instead of chilled. We hope you come back to try it Thanks for coming back!

review_text: Superbaba is becoming a local vancouver legend after many years in Victoria. Setting the standard for what a wrap should be fresh baked pita fresh cooked meats fresh salad and good sauces. Very customizable and good portions.
Typical Vancouver pricing but worth it. You ll be satisfied with the large portions and also enjoy every bite. The chicken is so moist and flavourful, and so is the cauliflower.
Counter service. Delicious food. Gluten free options. I recommend the chicken bowl or falafels Dietary restrictions: Several gluten free options
Delicious! Pumped to have a place like this in the hood, the eggplant is bang on! Spicy sauce is great, not sure how to order extra online. Order ahead of time, this place is busy!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Amanda! You can order a side sauce online and choose hot sauce if you d like more

review_text: The food here is ABSOLUTELY gorgeous. I have yet to be disappointed by the food or the service. So far I have had  both chicken and steak wraps and bowls. Seriously amazing.
Very good and falafel is always consistently good. Wish they didn t change the fries though!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michael! The kennebec potato supply is having a bit of a chaotic time right now, we swapped to another one for the moment, we should be back to normal by end of august, fingers crossed!

review_text: Quality food with clean flavors, their Falafel is the freshest in town. Also the staff are always nice

Updated Review: Since my previous review I have revisited SuperBaba, the owner was very nice and humble, and has since implemented new dress code for the kitchen. I will definitely be returning. The food was phenomenal and give the Mint Lemonade a try and thank me later :) Old Review: We went in to order take out. The staff were super friendly. Issue was that after picking up our order and walking to our destination to eat our food, we found multiple HAIRS in our food. At this point we had walked too far to go back and it was around closing time. Ended up not eating the food (besides this being disgusting, we are in the middle of a pandemic). I sent an email to the store with pictures, and the least I was expecting was a were sorry, we will make sure ALL staff whom are handling and/or exposed to the food wear a hair net. But instead, there was no reply from the restaurant. In conclusion, they make very yummy food, but I would caution you to check your food and perhaps avoid the restaurant altogether until the kitchen staff wear hair nets. Good thing is that you can see the kitchen staff if they dont wear hair nets.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks! We are glad it all worked out. Hi Dariush, first we apologise for your recent experience. We take our food prep very seriously, so we are going to look into what happened. We didn t receive any messages anywhere, can we ask where you sent them? Can you please email us at info@eatsuperbaba.com we will take care of this right away

review_text: Great fast service. Food was super fresh, tasty, and innovative. Get the cauli wrap if youre hungry and in the mood for a vegetarian flavor bomb. Falafel was good too.
The best tasting food for work days! Quality is persistent and always high.

I cant believe Ive been working on the same block as Superbaba for 7 months and didnt discover it until this week! Amazing falafels, best Ive ever had. Everything is so fresh, its very clean and comfy inside and they play great tunes!
Food is great, everything was fresh and tasty. The restaurant is beautifully designed and the staff very friendly.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jessica! That is so nice of you to say

review_text: The is good and delicious, also the staffs are nice. Note. They dont accept cash Food
Loved the chicken bowl, crispy eggplant bowl and falafel bowl. Turmeric cookies are a must!! Get a side of fries too. Please bring back the steak bowl
Very good value and super tasty Lebanese food. Great options for both carnivores and veggie eaters

Was skeptical at first due to the unusual ingredient list in the chicken wrap, but thought they must be in business for a reason so I gave it a shot and was very pleasantly surprised. Unlike most shwarma places that are greasy and heavily decorated in sauces, this place manages to keep it light while still retaining an amazing flavor due to how well all the ingredients compliment each other. Highly recommend trying it if you are in the area even if you think you wont like it due to the ingredients, because you are probably wrong.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks! We are so glad you enjoyed it

review_text: This place is amazing! Staff was kind and helpful with choices. Eggplant fries are out if this world. I order for pick up and was ready right on time!
Great portion size, fresh and very tasty. Friendly staff in a clean environment Food

This place has the best falafel I ve ever had in my entire life and that is not an exaggeration. So soft and moist. It s what I dream of. Falafel wrap was so flavorful and the mint lemonade was the most refreshing thing I ve literally ever put in my mouth. It was delicious. Please go here it s so good 10/10

I really enjoy having Superbaba for lunch. The wraps are a great choice and the bread is always super fresh (I believe they make them in house). It s not exactly a typical shawarma/donair that you d find in Vancouver but it s got a really unique taste that I think is definitely worth trying.

Pros: One of the best quick takeout spots on Main Street. Their tastiest items are the Falafel Bowl and the Chicken Wrap. Online pickup system is a breeze to use. Cons: Their prices have gone up quite a few times over the last year or so, and their new  beef kofta is not good. The value isnt there as it once was... but thats 2022 in a nutshell isnt it?
Falafel is soooo good and tasty!! Highly recommended.

WOW! What a fantastic neighbourhood gem! We ordered takeout from Superbaba, both Falafel bowls, and they were outstanding. Huge portions, lots of veggies, amazing falafels, incredible hummus. Ordered online and it was ready super fast. This will definitely be our go to place for amazing tasting Middle Eastern food. So good!
